title: Inception
overview: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal secrets and is offered a chance at redemption.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker learns his reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against its creators.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A young girl enters a spirit world and must work to free her parents.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes assemble to stop a global threat.

title: Interstellar
overview: Explorers travel through a wormhole to save humanity from a dying Earth.

title: The Godfather Part II
overview: The saga of the Corleone family continues through parallel past and present stories.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: Interwoven tales of crime and redemption unfold in Los Angeles.

title: Coco
overview: A young musician journeys to the Land of the Dead to discover his family's story.
